channel.title: Bouldering on Get Amongst It!
channel.description: Recent content in Bouldering on Get Amongst It!

item.title: Building a bouldering wall
item.description: In the last twelve months or so my son has taken an interest in climbing, in particular bouldering. Given his burgeoning desire to climb, I thought I would build a wall under our house. We have a post-war Queensland house typical in suburbs in and around Brisbane. So, how was a guy with no construction experience going to achive this task? Well below is a quick wrap of what I got up to.
